items.sentence: If you do what I want you to do, I'll give this to you.
She's already rich even though she's only 26 years old.
She's so gullible she'll believe anything you tell her.
She's in total denial about her husband's philandering.
I don't have the willpower to follow through on a diet.
Tom isn't leaving tonight. He's leaving tomorrow night.
Even Tom didn't pretend that the movie was interesting.
If you can survive this, then you can survive anything.
In order to survive, Tom now needs a kidney transplant.
The old couple living across the street hate teenagers.
All horses are animals, but not all animals are horses.
I think that it's time for me to make some new friends.
Tom and Mary have had a lot of interesting experiences.
Once you've decided when you'll be coming, let me know.
I went to the theater early so I could get a good seat.
You're the last person I would've expected to see here.
If you'd parked your car here, you would've been fined.
That's what I get for learning French by reading books.
Tom draped his arms protectively over Mary's shoulders.
Please don't forget to put the letter into the mailbox.
